{{studyDto.title}} {{studyDto.origin}}

{{studyDto.date}}

{{studyDto.description}}

import { Component, OnInit, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { StudyDto } from '../../dtos/StudyDto'; @Component({ selector: 'study', templateUrl: './study.component.html', styleUrls: ['./study.component.less'] }) export class StudyComponent implements OnInit { constructor() { } @Input() studyDto: StudyDto; ngOnInit() { } public openStudy() { if (this.studyDto.isOpen ) { this.studyDto.isOpenAni = false; setTimeout(()=>{this.studyDto.isOpen = false;},500) } else { this.studyDto.isOpen = true; this.studyDto.isOpenAni = true; } } }
